text: I wish to take advantage of what I think is a new argument, -strict, in Java 7's jarsigner facility.  This allows jarsigner to exit non-zero vs just issuing a warning. I may be mistaken, but it seems that Ant's signjar has not yet accommodated this feature. If it does, then the docs for signjar are not clear to me.  The net of what I am trying to do is have my Ant build fail if my signing cert has expired.  Thanks...
